name: Hevto Men Wetsuits 3/2mm Neoprene Wet Suit Back Front Zip in Cold Water for Surfing Swimming Diving
short_description: Why - Wetsuits can give you extra warmth in cold water. The working principle of wetsuits is that a thin layer of water will be left on the body when water enters the clothes, then this layer of water will generate heat from friction as the body moves, which protects the body from the cold.

What - Hevto training wetsuits are designed for adult men surfing/diving beginners and amateurs. The royal blue sleeves and side seams create a striking color clash with the black. You may feel constricted the first time wear it, but it’s necessary to provide you with warmth and buoyancy. Once you get used to it, you'll find that the wetsuit not only keeps you warm in the cold water but also helps you float more easily, allowing you to master your swimming and diving skills more quickly.

Where- Hevto wetsuits are made of 3/2mm neoprene and nylon stretch fabric for softness and comfort. Stretchy fabrics give the wetsuit flexibility and fit body shape perfectly, which helps reduce the resistance to water. It is suitable for all kinds of water sports, such as diving, swimming, surfing, snorkeling, paddleboarding, kayaking, jet ski, etc.

How - No need to worry about the back zipper will bring trouble, we not only have a sturdy zipper track but also set a lengthened nylon belt. Zip it up quickly requires only two steps - grab the bottom of the zipper track and then pull it up with the other hand. You can instantly enjoy the smooth zipping process with the correct operation.

Who - The Hevto wetsuit is not just a piece of gear but a companion that embodies resilience, determination, and passion to explore the unknown waters. Wearing a Hevto wetsuit connects you to a community of water lovers who share the same sense of adventure and respect for the ocean.

name: Niksa Men Wetsuit 3/2mm, SBR Neoprene Full Wet Suit YKK Back Zip for Surfing Swimming Diving Water Sports
short_description: 3MM SBR Neoprene & Anti-Tear : Made of 3mm thick SBR neoprene for superior durability and windproof insulation. Specially treated to minimize rubber odor, offering a more comfortable wearing experience.
YKK Back Zipper & Easy On/Off: Features a durable YKK reverse zipper for smooth, one-handed operation. The ergonomic back design ensures hassle-free wear and prevents chafing during movement.

Triple Protection: Upgraded SBR neoprene fabric has triple protection of windproof/warmth/heat insulation, which can lock the body temperature tightly and also effectively isolate most of the cold water infiltration, which is suitable for diving, surfing and other water sports in low-temperature water.

Upgraded velcro neckline :Improved collar with wider Velcro design to fit different neck shapes and not easy to come off; fine edge wrapping to avoid friction that may cause puckering or skin irritation, durability is greatly improved, anti-abrasion knee pads can withstand wear and tear on surfboards or rocky surfaces.

Multi-Purpose：The Niksa full wetsuit is the ideal choice for water sports enthusiasts, perfect for diving, snorkeling, surfing, kayaking, and more. Its reinforced elbow and knee panels enhance flexibility and durability, while the sealed seams provide superior waterproofing to keep you dry and warm even in cold waters. NOTE: Hand wash the wetsuit in cold water with a neutral detergent and air dry, taking care not to iron or use bleach.

name: Cressi Morea 3 mm Man Monopiece Wetsuits
short_description: Adult one-piece wetsuit made in 3 mm Premium Quality Neoprene, ideal for any kind of water sport, such as snorkeling, surfing, diving, and paddle boarding.
The arms and legs are in Ultraspan Neoprene to ensure free movements and ease donning, while the chest is in rubberized neoprene to ensure warmth.
The dorsal YKK zipper is equipped with an Aquastop flap to reduce water leaks. The ankle and wrist finishes are completed using Overlock cuffs.
The annatomical cuts make this wetsuit adaptable at different shapes of bodies. The knees feature a protection against bumps and scratches.
The Morea wetsuit is designed in Italy by Cressi and made in Cambodia. Cressi has been a brand pioneer in Scuba Diving, Snorkeling, and Freediving equipment since 1946.
